DOC.brief_summary: Evaluate the proportion of hyperlipaemic persons with known coronary heart disease achieving ldl-c goal as defined by the national cholesterol education program (NCEP) adult treatment panel (ATP) III guidelines
DOC.brief_title: Vytorin (10/20 Or 10/40) Compared to Atorvastatin (10 mg or 20 mg) in Patients With Coronary Artery Disease (0653A-126)(COMPLETED)
DOC.criteria: Patients who are na√Øve to lowering lipid agent Patients who are treated with lowering lipid agents and had a washout period for 4 weeks. Impaired kidney function Increased liver enzyme levels Pregnant women Hypersensitivity to ezetimibe and other statin agents
